column4: Hi guys;  I'm trying to install a program. and it tells me i need the openssl binary, and openssl developmental libraries.. I sudo apt-get install openssl, and "which openssl" points to /usr/bin/openssl.. am i missing a package?

Hi guys;  I'm trying to install a program. and it tells me i need the openssl binary, and openssl developmental libraries.. I sudo apt-get install openssl, and "which openssl" points to /usr/bin/openssl.. am i missing a package??
